text:
Priye Bhrata Aaishi

Bahgwaan kare tere jaisa roommate kisi ko na mile, kitna ganda rakhta hai room bsdk.
Tere jaisa multitasker maine kabhi dekha nahi tu harr kaam dil laga ke karta hai, SAE,  semester, GYM , squaash , bhollyball, etc etc. 
Kitna kanjoos hai tu be bsdk ek treat nikalwaane mein gaand mar jaati thi,  kabhi kabhi mann hota tha raat ko sote hue pel doon tere ko.
Puraani baaten yaad karta hoon to tera bhollyball ke smaaaash, canteen mein tera randirona, logon ke cheezen cheen ke khana, aur galaxy mein tera almaa dolmaa , ye sab yaad aata hai. Tere saath rahte rahte teri aadat si gayi thi mujhe sala ghar pe jab sota hoon to lagta hai abhi subah uthte hi aaishi ki baddi sakal dekhni padegi, raat mein jab batti jala ke padhta hoon to lagta jai abhi aaishi bhosdiwala light band karne ko bolega. First year mein yaad hai tujhe gaali theek se dena nahi aata tha madarchod ki jagah madarchut bolta tha , gaali dena bhi maine hi sikhaya hai.

Tu waise to bahut productive hota hai lekin ladki ke chakkar mein tu bahut chutiya ban jata hai, jab bhi teri aur Ashreeta ki kahani yaad karta hoon tere chutiyaape ka khayaal aata hai .
Tera approach toward life dekh kar ye lagta hai ki bahut bade mukaam haasil karega.
P.S.- Aage se kabhi bhi prem ke matters mein apne ego ko side mein hi rakhna and also Ashreeta kabhi mile to usse mera hi bolna.

Tumhara Bhrata
Avinash
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
Tum doge na saath mera Abhishek..
Abse jab bhi milenge experiment karenge, lekin iss baar soft and hard boobs wala karenge. Khus raho hamesa , aur haan tu mota hi achha lagta hai patla hone ki jarrorat nahi hai
author: Avinash  Arya

text: Agli baar jab bhi milenge experiment karenge lekin iss baar soft and hard b**bs ka karenge. Khush raho hamesa, aur tu mota hi achha lagta hai patla hone ki jarrorat nahi hai.
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
Pandey yaar 
Chaddhi king , maza aata tha tujhe chaddhi mein dekh ke, aise hi chaddhi mein ghoomte rahna, last mein maze bhut kiya bhai, Tune bowling mein bahut improve kiya wo bhi do hafte mein itna jaldi seekhte hue kisi ko nahi dekha maine, tere ko peetna bahut kathin ho gaya tha last tak, aur bsdk madarchod gandu lawde mera hi wicket kyon leta tha bsdk, poore din main sochta tha ki aaj chakke peeloonga pandey ko sala ek chakka hi maar pata tha.
Aur tere se mujhe paise wasoolna seekhna hai, saala koi bhi wapas hi nahi karta. Kabhi kabhi to aisa ho gaya tha ki avinash ke paise lage hain matlab nahi dena hai.
Tu ek field main improve kar sakta hai ki, maze karne ka intezzar nahi karte, ye soch ke nahi baithete ki kuch ban jaaonga fir maze karoonga, dekho jo kuch bhi hai abhi hai isliye usse khul ki jeeyo kyon ki kal kisne dekha . Jiase ki ho sakta tha last mein hame buaate hi nahi to kya hota koi maza naa ho pata.
Baaki pandey tu hai dil kaa saaf aadmi aur jeevan mein kai mukaan haasil karega , jald hi milenge tu to pass ka hi hai , teri shaadi mein naagin dance karege saali waali kidnap kar loonga.

P.S.- Tera ladikyon ko lekar jo approach hai wo mast hai aise hi bajate raho lekin vivaah hone ke baad kuch kiya to tere biwi ko sab bata doonga fir uska kandha ban jaaonga aur aage ki kahani to tu jaanta hi hai (no body no body  no body .......... does it better).
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
Priye Bhrata Aniket
Tere ko gaali sikhaane ke chakkar mein meri gaali khaane ki aadat ho gayi, sala koi bhi galiya ke bhaag jata tha. Chill hai par jab tu yaad karega ki kon gaali dena sikhaya to mera naam yaad aayega.
Aur be mast, khulke jiya karo present mein bahut aage peeche ki chinta mat kiya karo.
P.S.- Exercise kiya kar nahi to bahut mota ho jaayega.

Tumhara Bhrata 
Avinash
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
Priye Bhrata Ankit 
Kahan se suru karoon bahut jyada baaten hain. First year mein dono saath mein padhna suru kiye wahan se achhi dosti suru ho gayi , tu wing ke neeche khada hoke jab mera naam pukaarta tha to behenchod poora wing jaan jata tha , hum dono ka naam galat tareeke se joda jana laga.kaise din raat NCL mein chudaate the fir doaa canteen jaake gaand marwaate the aur aisa karte karte aavishkaar hua maa chudaane waale Shaashtra ka. Aur apni dasti aur bhi pakki tab hui jab hame pata chala ki hum dono ka dil ek hi apsara pe hai . Kiase dono saath mein milke uski sundarta ka varnan karte the , kabhi kabhi sochta tha ki engineering chhod ke sayar ban jaaon aur sirf ussi ke liye likhoon. 2nd year taak aate aate  jab hum poori tarah se niraas ho gaye the tab aaviskaar hua BUS theory ka. Pata nahi kyon tere har baat share karna kitna aasan lagta tha. Peeche mud ke dekhta hoon to tere ko wing se nikaalne ka bhut dukh hota hai mere ko and I feel more sad when I realize ki main tujhe wing mein daal sakta tha mere paas authority thi fir bhi pata nahi kyon nahi kiya main. Main Parag  aur tu mere ko ek trio jaisa feeling aata tha jisme main comfortable feel karta tha, aur hum log sab milke dabba aur phone banwaane jaate the aur sirf wahi kaam karke aate the(kaisa laga mera mazak) . Aur teri dard bhari kahaniyaan jo tu bahut khoobi ke saath sunata tha I feel sad for every girl jo tujhe jaan nahi paayi ki tu heera hai bsdk.

P.S. -IAS ban ke jis ladki se shaadi karna uski koi bahiya si bahen ya cousin jarror honi chahye aur usse mere liye book karke rakhna.

Tumhara BHrata
Avinash
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
Priye Bhrata Parag
First year mein main hagge ke uss paar jayad jata nahi tha lekin fir mujhe pata chala ki uss tarah mere jaise chill logon ki sankhya jyada hai.
Mera Ankit Aur tera ek trio sa ban gay tha jisme main bahut comfortable feel karta tha usme saath mein bahut maa chudai ki hai pizza hut ,ghoomna kanpur mein  bahut maza aata tha. Fir vollyball ko yaad karta hoon to tu hamesa side mein khada dikhta hai , mast maa chodi hai ssamne waali team ki dono ne.
Mujhe tera wo masoon chehra yaad nahi jab tu kisi baat ka bura maanta hai lekin saamne wala serious hi nahi hota wo to ye maan ke chalta hai Parag bura maan hi nahi sakta, Parag maa chudaae.
fir baat karte hain apne college ke sabse bade acomplishment ki TRIP . Kya maze kiya bhai bhai mera wo pahla trip tha jisme mujhe pata chala ki alsi maze doston ke saath hain, jagan matter nahi karti.
Aur tumne bsdk wo kar dikhaya jo main aur Ankit kabhi sapne mein bhi nahi dekh paaye , Uss pari ke saath dance bsdk madarchod gaandu mere ko bahut dukh hota hai jab bhi yaad karta iss baat ko. Saath mein itni bakchodi ki hai yaad hi nahi aa raha saari baaten.

P.S.-Jugni waterfall to jaake rahenge behenchod.

Tumara Bhrata
Avinash
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
Priye Bhrata IP
Takneek mein plane udhyaya 
bada maz aaya. Mujhe to laga tha ki tera palin udega hi nahi lekin sala first aa gaya uske baad hall mein jo anthum aake gaya uska bahut maze aaya tha. Tera happy face bahut mast hai yaar , teri didi ki shaadi mein nahi aa paya uska bahut dukh hai mujhe. Techkriti mein jo plane banaya tha wo yaad hi hoga usme bhi bahut maza aaya tha.
Sabse mast baat tere naam pukaarne mein bahut maza aata hai mere ke IP IP IP. 
Jaldi hi milenge tu to passka hi hai sirf 300km door. Aise hi muskuraate rahna.

P.S.- Apni Sarp vidya kabhi bhoolna mat.

Tumhara Bhrata
Avinash
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
yaar Ishu 
saath mein football khel ke bahut maza aaya, itni saari treat saath mein ki yaar. football se jayada treat mein bonding bani . uske baad summer camp to yaad hi hoga . abe  hamesha muskuraaate rahna.
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
Priye Bhrata Jaspreet
Main hamesha se chaahta tha ki mera koi pujaabi dost ho lekin meri ye iccha adhoori hi rah gayi kyonki tu to mera bhai hai. Teri smile kisi ko bhi vash mein kar sakti hai, mujhe lagta hai tu gensec bhi apni smile ki wagah se hi bana hai, logon ne teri smile dekhi hogi poster mein fir resist hi nahi paaye hoge tujhe vote dene se.
Waise to tu beech mein gayab ho gaya tha lekin tere saath football khelna ab bhi yaad hai, teri wp tatti se dribbling , waahiyaat si juggling , ek baat to tujhe maanna hi padega ki tere se achha juggling, chest recieve, hedder mera tha.
Waise tune hame ek parjai dilai aur hamare khaandaan ka naam roshan kiya (maar bhi khilaayi).
Abhi jab Parjai ji campus aayi thi to tum dono ko saath dekh ke aisa laga ki jaise made for each other , mujhe aisa laga uss din maar khana waste nahi gaya, Parajai ji kaa saath kabhi mat chhodna warnaa gaand maar doonga teri.
Ek baat to mai bhool hi gaya , teri smile to mast hai lekin uske saath jo awaaz nikaala hai usse sun ke muh todna ka mann karta hai tera.
Waise to tere saath bahut si baaten yaad hain lekin somethings are best left unsaid, unhe baad mein  yaad karke hansa muskuraana chahiye.
Ek baat main clear kar dena chaahta hoon ki tere se jyada taakatwar, bodybuilder, abs and everything  mere pass hai to tu kabhi meri barabari karne ke baare mein sochna bhi mat, aur tu hi wo bhosdiwala hai naa jo sabko batata firta hai ki juggling karte hue mere ko injury hui hai, aage se aisa kiya to gaand maar doonga.
Tere se gale lagna ab bhi yaad hai kyon se teri height similar si hai naa to gale lagna aasan padta hai,
aage jab bhi milege mast lamba wala hug karenge.

P.S.- Kiss Parjai for me

Tumhara Bhrata 
Avinash
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
Priye Bhrata Kishan
Yaar tu mere ko Gentleman lagta hai jisse koi bhi salaah li jaaye to wo galat baat nahi batayega.
Tu har kaam effortlessly kar leta hai yaar . First year mein saale tumne aur Aaishi dono ne milke room ki maa chod ke rakhi thi tum dono ne mere ko bhi aise rakhna sikha diya.
Aise hi mast chill marrke kaam karte raho aur har mukaan haasil karte raho.
P.S. - Aage se koi ladki hint de to miss mat karna.

Tumhara Bhrata
Avinash
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
Priye Bhrata Navin
Saale tune porri wing mein itna gaypan faila diya ki koi bhi kisi ki bhi gaand maar leta hai aur wo bura nahi maanta, logon mein humping competition chaalu karwa diya bsdk. Jabtak tu apna saara pyaar Abhit par lutata tha tab tak theek tha lekin fir to randomlu logon ko target karne laga ye randapa bahar mat karna .
Teri smile, wahi to kaarna hai ki kashish chan tere pe marti hai, ek salaah deta hoon agar pyaar ho to izhaar bhi karo.
Saale teri body mast hai lekin kya faayda ek ladki ka bozh to sah nahi paayi.
Tere saath wo cricket khelnaa tere ko chakke pelna hamesha yaad rahega.

P.S.- Kiss Kashish Chan for me if you ever get chance.

Tumhara Bharat 
Avinash
author: Avinash  Arya

text: bhai yaad hai TA ka project dono ne milke ke banaya tha aur koi bsdwala nahi tha , sab ke sab kaamchor. Tere andar mujhe khud ki parchayi dikhti hai hum dono ki buddhi bahut tezz nahi har to usse mehnat se compansate karna padta hai. aur labs mein bahut bakchodiyaan ki hai bhai aise hi hamesha muskuraate rahna.
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
Ritik ji aapke saath galaxy mein kaam karke bahut maza aaya . Aapko apna upnaam to yaad hi hoga jo Divyanshu ne diya tha "Lachcha" jiske bina kuch achha nahi lagta tha mujhe.
Apke bane hue posters ne campus ki shaan bhadhai kabhi kabhi lagta hai aap HSS mein galat aa gaye the lekin aap jahan bhi jaate hain apna sau parishat dete hain. Aakhir kaar apne apni roochi ka kaam dhoondh hi liya jo tha designing aur aapne usme katai chaanpa hai aage bhi chaanpte rahiye. 
Hamari subhkamnaayen aapke saath hain.
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
Disclaimer- Neeche kahani mein kisi bhi paatr ka kisi se bhi koi sambandh nahi hai, agar samaanta milti hi to ye sirf sanyog maatr hai.
ek baar ki baat hai ek ladke se treat maanga gaya to usne bola mere paas paise nahi hain , duri baaar treat maanga gaya to usne bola main nahi doonga , teesri baar maanga gaya to usne bola treat kya hoti hai , chauthi baar jisne treat maanga uss ladke ne usko pehchaane se hi inkaar diya . Baar baar treat maange se wo ladka bahut pareshaan se rahne laga. Ek baar usne bhagwaan se pooncha "hey iswar sab log mujhse hamesha treat kyon maangta hai ",  ye sunn kar bhawaan krodhit hokar bole " kyon ki madarchod bsdk tum kabhi treat diye hi nahi ho".
P.S.-Yehi baaten soch soch ke to mujhe maza aata hai
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
Priye Bhrata Sharma
Galaxy mein tujhse mulaaakaat hui aur wahan se jo dosti bani wo amar ho gayi hai. 
Sabse pahli baat teri aawaj aur bolne ka lahza bahut mast hai tere ko bolte hue sunne main babut maza aata tha, lakin kabhi kabhi tark mein bolte waqt jo tu chehre ke expressions banata tha naa usse dekh mujhe aur Harshit ko bahut maza aata tha. Tera bina practice kane mein bilkul maza nahi tha .
Fir aate hain dumbc pe uske to kya hi kahne main tark karte karte marr jata agar hum log last mein dumbc ki practice na karte , dumbc hi tha jisne hamara aapas ka bond aur seniors(akshit , ji prakhar ji, Thoury, Sampat , Sudhaanhu) se bhi badhaya, Dumbc hi kaaran tha ki hamara harr practice happy note pe khatam hota tha. Main ligos kabhi nahi bhoolonga mainre apne wing waalon ko bhi sikha diya last ke months mein aur ushe bhi bahut maza aaya.
Tum last mein milne nahi aa paaye uska hisaab alag se dena padega meri adalat mein jahan judge, vakeel, gawah aur dandnayak sab main hi hoon.
I wish tu meri wing mein rahta hota bahut gaand marate saath mein.
Tune ek baar bola tha jab hum budhdhe ho jaayenge aur alumni meet hoga to aayegi aur tu sabke samne mujhe kaluva bulaaega, well I am waiting for that day, lekin wo to bahut door ki baat hai, fir se jald hi milenge mere Kota mein kuch hissab kitaab baaki hain aur wo Do anmol ratan bhi to wahi hain (Waise do nahi ek hi hai, apne year ki).

P.S.-waise to dhoodh ki rakhwaali ke liye billi rakhna bewkoofi hai lekin fir bhi tere upar bharosaa kar raha hoon Kota ka wo anmol ratan tere bharose chhod raha hoon.

Tumara Bhrata 
Avinash
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
yaar tere saath football kheln mein bahut mazaa aaya, tere wo chutiya jaise moves, kya dance karta hai poora khelte waqt. Aur yaad hoga ki blueworld mein teri gaand fati hui thi harr ride mein .
Aur ye bhi yaad hoga ki kaise bhooton se dar lagta hai aur ek baar jab sachin ghar chala gaya tha to main tere room pe aake soya thaa taaki tu subah tak jinda rahe, bsdk ab to darna chhod de itna bada ho gaya hai.
Muskuraate raho hamesa and wishing you all the best for your life ahead.
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
Madarchod Shubhankar
KYa be bsdk mere maze lene mein bahut maza aata hai , gaand maar doonga khade khade. Waise to hum football ground mein mile the tu achha khelta tha I admit it lekin tera tatti headers ab bhi yaad karta hoon to hansi aa jaati hai.
Tere ko IFL team mein naa leke sabse mast kaam kiya tha maine nahi to sala final bhi nahi khel paate.
Waise jitna bura to banne ki koshish karta hai uska ek percent bhi nahi hai, mere height ko lekar tera same se joke sun ke bore ho gaya tha.
bahut saari parties ki hain saath mein, bahut maza aaya yaar , tu nahi hota to football khelna boring ho jata mere liye.
Tera food choice bahut mast hai harr baar maza aa jata tha jab bhi tu order karta tha .Main wo lucknow ki trip pe nahi jaa paya uska dukh hai mujhe, khair chhodo.
Tu jo bhi life mein accomplish karna chaah raha hai wo jarror milega tujhe aakhir mera putra hai naa tu.
Bsdk jab bhi mere pangaa lega maa chod doonga teri.
 P.S.- AAnd ka naa gaand ka gyaan chode bramhaand kaa. ye tu hi

Peace out lekin apna war to chalta hi rahega , khus raho bsdk.

 Tumara Madarchod Mitra
Avinash
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
Priye putra Sugam
Teri gaand chappal se laal karni ki meri bahut ichha hoti thi lekin harr baar  tera maasoom chehra dekh ke main apna mann badal deta tha. Puraani baaten yaad karta hoon to tera wo bhosdipana yaad hai jab tu mujhe apne future ke regarding darata tha, aur tera wo harr jagah pe tatti si baaten karnna bhi yaad hai.
Lekin bete teri bahut yaad aati hai, tu bahut hi sweet banda hai doosron ki feelings ka khayal karta hai, mere bachhe apna khayal rakhna jahan bhi rahna aur khus rahna.

Tumhara Baap
Avinash
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
Priya Bhrata Suraj
Jab bhi tumhe yaad karta hoon to ek hansta hua chehra yaad aata hai. Teri prem kahaani sun ke mujhe ek baat to pakki hai ki struggler aadmi hai, aage bhi jeevan main kabhi haar mat maana struggle karte rahna. Last ke do mahine mein bahut maze aaye , tere kahne pe gaanga foonka hoon. Ek slaah dena chahoonga, (iss salaah ko kisi puraane incident se mat jodga ye in general) maafi maangne se kabhi koi chhota nahi hota, baat sahi galat to baad ki baat hai lekin agar saamne waale ka dil saaf ho to uska dil rkhne ke liye bhi sorry bola jaa sakta hai.
Bahut ho gayi serious baat, tune hamare pariwaar ka naam roshan kiya baapu ko bahu dilaayi aur wo bhi hame maar khilaaye bina unlike Jaspreet.

P.S.-Keep smiling aur Neha ka saath mat chhodna , mujhe prem kahaniyaan anjaam tak pahunte dekhne mein achha mahsoos hota hai.

Tumahar bhrata
Avinash
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
Tere upar ek line bahut acche se baithti hai ki "Sab janana hai iss bhadwe ko".
Sach kahoon to tere ko pareshaan karne mein bahut maza aata tha jab main tere ko koi cheez nahi batata tha aur tu randirona karta tha XD.
Tera ye nature mujhe bahut pasand hai kaam ke time kaam karta hai aur chill ke time poora chill hi maarta hai maa chudaae duniya plan bhi nahi banata wo bhi doosron par chhodta hai. Trip pe bhi tu yehi karta tha , yaar trip pe kya maze aaye the bas mujhe iss baat ka bahut thoda sa dukh hai ki maine piya nahi tha kheerganga mein. Sab saath mein bhand hote hain to alag hi maza aata hai ye mujhe ab realize hua hai.
Jald hi kanyaaon ki baarish hone waali hai tere upar ready rahna chhata lekar.
Tujhe jab bhi yaad karoonga to tera wahi gidgidata hua chehra hi yaad aayega aur tu bol raha hoga "batao naaaaaaa please mujhe bhi batao naaaaaaaa".
Aur ek bahut jarrori baat batani hai tere ko.................................





























































































nahi bataonga bsdk maaa chudaaaaa.......
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
Yaar Vakul mast aadmi hai yaar tu labs mein tune kaafi help ki hai.
Teri  smile bahut mast hai yaar , sala ussi se ladkiyaan pata raha hai . Tere saath vollyball khelna yaad hai kaise uchal uchal ke aage khelta tha hagta tha chaanpta tha , lekin bahut maz aaata tha.
Trip pe aate hain, yaar bahut maze kiye, trip ke pahle tujhe bahut achhe se nahi jaanta tha  lekin yaar tu pakka dost ho gaya uske baad. Teri gaanza maarne ki videos hain mere paas jab tu khoob ameer ho jaayega to tere ko blackmail karoonga ki parents ke paas bhej doonga.
Aise hi hanste rahna aur Jab bhi jaspreet se mile to meri taraf se uski gaand maar lena.
author: Avinash  Arya

text:
Priye Baba
Yaar tu bahut mast aadmi hai , tere on the spot jokes matlab teri haazirjawabi aur tera sense of humour bahut hansata tha mere ko. Ekdum down to the earth aadmi lagta hai tu mujhe, tere decisions bahut mast hote the koi bhi cheez mein dikkat ho to Baba ka opinion lena best maante the sabhi log.
Kabhi gussa hote hue nahi dekha maine tere ko .
Tera to asli naam bhi bhool jata hoon main kabhi kabhi abhi memoir likhne ke liye baba hi search kiya tha.
Main sochta hoon tumhaare jeevan mein kanya kyon nahi hai , lekin chalo achha hua nahi to tera behaviour change ho jata tera aur hame hamara baba nahi mil pata, waise ab ladkiyon ki baarish hogi to chhata leke ready rahna.
tera behaviour itna mast hai ki tune hum jaise logon se apne aap ka upnaam nikalawaya.
Yaar aise hi mast rahna aur present mein jeena jaisa tu hamesa karta hai.
P.S.- Jaldi hi milenge aur Daaru party karenge.

Tumhara Bhrata 
Avinash
author: Avinash  Arya
